46694V201 - ITP - LEVEL 5 - MAIN BUILDING - Installation of RIS Anchor Points SA711 thru SA723
template name: 46694V201 - ITP - LEVEL 5 - MAIN BUILDING - Installation of RIS Anchor Points SA711 thru SA723

name: Position and orientation of anchor point to roof/structure
CHARACTERISTICS - AS5532 6.3.1.3 (v) AS1891.4 - 3.1.2 (g) Single point anchorages suitable for direct connection of personal fall-arrest
Additional Pendulum fixing points to roof/wall/structure to allow safe transition and access
CHARACTERISTICS - AS1891.4 Table 2.1 restraint technique AS4488 5.3 a
CHARACTERISTICS - AS1891.4 - 3.1.2 (g) Single point anchorages suitable for direct connection of personal fall-arrest AS5532 7.3 (f)
CHARACTERISTICS - AS5532 7.1 a, b, c, d, e, f & g
REFERENCE - Systems can be accessed safely by trained persons without the risk of an uncontrolled fall
Position and orientation of anchor point to roof
REFERENCE - Eye of anchor to run 90 degrees to the primary work area.
○ Glued-in anchorages shall be placed so that the shear load and the pull angle must not exceed 20° to the surface in which the bolt is installed.
SA711 - SA713 Chemical anchor fitting per anchor/bolt, SA721- SA723 Chemical anchor fitting per anchor/bolt
○ Minimum depth of hole: 90mm (complete the hole that you start to the correct depth and the hole is cleaned appropriately)
○ Clean drilled out hole, Hilti Chemical Set Product Code HIT200-R
COMMENTS - Confirm what size hole was drilled:
Anchor points to roof to prevent lateral swing fall are installed or mitigation agreed
REFERENCE - The distance to the next anchor is less than the length to the closest edge, unless mitigated by other means
Load Test each anchor with calibrated pull tester. Last calibration date must not exceed 12 months
REFERENCE - 15kN tested to 7.5kN. Test the anchor once the chem-set has cured fully.
REFERENCE - Anchor sealed and inspected for water tight fit
Anchor at entry point with a stainless steel Strop
REFERENCE - Anchor strop must be positioned to enable user to reach and connect to.
○ Strop is marked and rated to 15kN.
○ Mallion/Quicklink connection to roof anchor point is secured and mechanically tightened or chemically set with loctite.
COMMENTS - Not applicable as anchor is not within the Fall Zone.
Site clean up and picture evidence if handover is not possible

REFERENCE - Site has been cleared of swarf or other debris installation inspection completed and witnessed by the customers representative. Where a client cannot sign for handover, clear high resolution pictures have been taken of each anchor point.
REFERENCE - Anchor fit for use sticker/tag filled in and attached to the anchor point, mark with confirmed rating. Entry point signage updated and installed.
Handover operating and systems documentation issued

REFERENCE - Core diameter 100mm hole, a minimum of 200mm deep and use 1 x 300ml tube of Hilti Hit 500 chem set. Core hole to be a minimum of 500mm from slab edge.

COMMENTS - Nominate the fixing method used
Position and orientation of primary and secondary anchor point to structure. Load Test each anchor/bolt with calibrated pull tester, last calibration date must not exceed 12 months.
REFERENCE - Eye of anchor to run 90 degrees to the primary work area.
○ Friction and glued-in anchorages shall be placed so that the shear load and the pull angle must not exceed 20° to the surface in which the bolt is installed.

REFERENCE - Sealed and inspected for water tight fit.
